segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes how to enforce application control rules by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes how to enforce application control rules by using AppLocker.

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes how to enforce application control rules by using AppLocker.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes how to enforce application control rules by using AppLocker.

segment.source: After AppLocker rules are created within the rule collection, you can configure the enforcement setting to Enforce rules or Audit only on the rule collection.
segment.target: After AppLocker rules are created within the rule collection, you can configure the enforcement setting to Enforce rules or Audit only on the rule collection.

segment.source: When AppLocker policy enforcement is set to Enforce rules, rules are enforced for the rule collection and all events are audited.
segment.target: When AppLocker policy enforcement is set to Enforce rules, rules are enforced for the rule collection and all events are audited.

segment.source: When AppLocker policy enforcement is set to Audit only, rules are only evaluated but all events generated from that evaluation are written to the AppLocker log.
segment.target: When AppLocker policy enforcement is set to Audit only, rules are only evaluated but all events generated from that evaluation are written to the AppLocker log.

segment.source: There is no audit mode for the DLL rule collection.
segment.target: There is no audit mode for the DLL rule collection.

segment.source: Therefore, test the impact of these rules first before deploying them to production.
segment.target: Therefore, test the impact of these rules first before deploying them to production.

segment.source: To enforce AppLocker rules by configuring an AppLocker policy to Enforce rules, see Configure an AppLocker policy for enforce rules.
segment.target: To enforce AppLocker rules by configuring an AppLocker policy to Enforce rules, see Configure an AppLocker policy for enforce rules.

segment.source: Caution: AppLocker rules will be enforced immediately on the local device or when the Group Policy object (GPO) is updated by performing this procedure.
segment.target: Caution: AppLocker rules will be enforced immediately on the local device or when the Group Policy object (GPO) is updated by performing this procedure.

segment.source: If you want to see the effect of applying an AppLocker policy before setting the enforcement setting to Enforce rules, configure the policy to Audit only.
segment.target: If you want to see the effect of applying an AppLocker policy before setting the enforcement setting to Enforce rules, configure the policy to Audit only.

segment.source: For info about how to do this, see Configure an AppLocker policy for audit onlyor Test an AppLocker policy by Using Test-AppLockerPolicy.
segment.target: For info about how to do this, see Configure an AppLocker policy for audit onlyor Test an AppLocker policy by Using Test-AppLockerPolicy.
